radiographic_examinations.findings: Diffusely fatty liver with focal sparing of the medial portion of the right lobe, hepatomegaly with a liver span of 26.5 cm, borderline enlargement of the spleen measuring 14.2 cm, no enlarged lymph nodes, normal pancreas, unremarkable appearance of the excluded portion of the stomach.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging of the brain
radiographic_examinations.findings: Enhancement and enlargement of the mammillary bodies, indicating necrosis consistent with Wernickeâ€™s encephalopathy.
